title: 10A - Computer Networks and Architecture in Operating Systems

questions.question: Networking allows devices to communicate and share resources.
Which of the following is NOT a benefit of using networks for information sharing?
choices: Requires physical devices like flash drives

questions.question: True or False: One software license can be used by many computers in a network.
Which of the following is a feature of network core devices like routers?
choices: They operate at the application layer
They work at the network layer and below

questions.question: In a client-server model, clients communicate directly with each other.
What is a key feature of Peer-to-Peer (P2P) architecture?
choices: All peers rely on a central server
Peers can act as both clients and servers
Peers only request data, not provide it

questions.question: Which of the following is a downside of P2P architecture?
True or False: Developing network applications requires writing software for routers.
Which of the following denotes how a network service is accessed?
Which statement best describes a protocol in networking?
choices: It is the hardware used for transmission
It defines rules and message formats for communication
It sets the price for internet services
It is a server that connects clients

questions.question: True or False: TCP provides reliable end-to-end bidirectional communication.
What is the difference between network architecture and application architecture?
choices: Network architecture is designed by app developers
Application architecture provides services to network layers
Network architecture organizes implementations and services provided to applications
They are both responsible for client-side code

questions.question: In the client-server model, which of the following is true?
choices: Clients communicate only with the server

questions.question: In process communication over a network, what is used to send and receive messages?
True or False: Inter-process communication only occurs between different devices on a network.
Which programming languages are commonly used to develop network applications?
True or False: In P2P architecture, new peers reduce the scalability of the system.
